title: Strictly Come Dancing's Dev Griffin becomes third celebrity eliminated
text:
Dev Griffin has been eliminated from Strictly (Picture: BBC)

Strictly Come Dancing’s Dev Griffin is the third celebrity to be eliminated from the competition after failing to wow the judges with his Cha Cha Cha.

The radio presenter and his partner Dianne Buswell were axed following a dance-off against Viscountess Emma Weymouth and Aljaž Škorjanec, with judges Craig Revel Horwood, Bruno Tonioli, Shirley Ballas and Motsi Mabuse unanimously voting to save Emma.

Delivering his verdict, Bruno said: ‘Emma and Aljaž were the couple that showed no mistakes. They were stronger, cleaner and focused.’

Meanwhile, Motsi said: ‘Particularly in the dance-off, Emma and Aljaž were the couple that looked more rehearsed and on top of it.’

Dev was devastated to be leaving Strictly and said of his untimely departure: ‘I’m not going to lie I am absolutely gutted, but learning how to dance, hanging out with Dianne and the other pros and celebs… I’ve absolutely loved it.’

The couple faced the dance-offs (Picture: BBC)

Dev and Dianne lasted four weeks on the show (Picture: PA)

His partner Dianne added: ‘Dev has been absolutely amazing. His work ethic is insane.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I see him everywhere practicing and I couldn’t have asked for a better partner. Thank you so much for all your time and your effort. This boy has so much talent, I’m really sad he won’t be able to show you guys anymore of it.’

Dev and Dianne were awarded 27 points from the judges after dancing their Cha Cha Cha, but they didn’t find themselves at the bottom of the scoreboard.

Three celebrities, Chris Ramsey, Will Bayley and Alex Scott, actually ended up receiving lower marks for their efforts however managed to win the public vote.

Strictly fans were seriously baffled by the panel’s scoring last night, as five contestants, Karim Zeroual, Mike Bushell, Kelvin Fletcher, Emma Barton and Safron Barker, received scores of nine.

Just last week, Dev and Dianne were second on the leaderboard after their Street performance to Aladdin hit Friend Like Me impressed the judges.

Strictly Come Dancing continues on Saturday at 6.40pm on BBC One.

description: Strictly Come Dancing shock as Dev Griffin becomes third celebrity eliminated from BBC 2019 series.
